mn92:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava anguttarapesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi yena apanam nama anguttarapanam nigamo tadavasari.
mn92:2.2: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito anguttarapesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi apanam anuppatto.
mn92:2.3: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn92:2.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
mn92:2.5: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
mn92:2.6: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
mn92:2.7: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
mn92:3.1: Atha kho keniyo jatilo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn92:3.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
mn92:3.3: Ekamantam nisinnam kho keniyam jatilam bhagava dhammiya kathaya sandassesi samadapesi samuttejesi sampahamsesi.
mn92:3.4: Atha kho keniyo jatilo bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn92:3.5: “adhivasetu me bhavam gotamo svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
mn92:3.6: Evam vutte, bhagava keniyam jatilam etadavoca:
mn92:3.7: “maha kho, keniya, bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani, tvanca brahmanesu abhippasanno”ti.
mn92:3.8: Dutiyampi kho keniyo jatilo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn92:3.9: “kincapi kho, bho gotama, maha bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani, ahanca brahmanesu abhippasanno;
mn92:3.10: adhivasetu me bhavam gotamo svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
mn92:3.11: Dutiyampi kho bhagava keniyam jatilam etadavoca:
mn92:3.12: “maha kho, keniya, bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani, tvanca brahmanesu abhippasanno”ti.
mn92:3.13: Tatiyampi kho keniyo jatilo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn92:3.14: “kincapi kho, bho gotama, maha bhikkhusangho addhatelasani bhikkhusatani, ahanca brahmanesu abhippasanno;
mn92:3.15: adhivasetu me bhavam gotamo svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
mn92:4.1: Atha kho keniyo jatilo bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana yena sako assamo tenupasankami; upasankamitva mittamacce natisalohite amantesi:
mn92:4.3: samano me gotamo nimantito svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena.
mn92:4.5: “Evam, bho”ti kho keniyassa jatilassa mittamacca natisalohita keniyassa jatilassa patissutva appekacce uddhanani khananti, appekacce katthani phalenti, appekacce bhajanani dhovanti, appekacce udakamanikam patitthapenti, appekacce asanani pannapenti.
mn92:4.6: Keniyo pana jatilo samamyeva mandalamalam patiyadeti.
mn92:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena selo brahmano apane pativasati tinnam vedanam paragu sanighanduketubhanam sakkharappabhedanam itihasapancamanam, padako, veyyakarano, lokayatamahapurisalakkhanesu anavayo, tini ca manavakasatani mante vaceti.
mn92:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena keniyo jatilo sele brahmane abhippasanno hoti.
mn92:6.2: Atha kho selo brahmano tihi manavakasatehi parivuto janghaviharam anucankamamano anuvicaramano yena keniyassa jatilassa assamo tenupasankami.
mn92:6.3: Addasa kho selo brahmano keniyassa jatilassa assame appekacce uddhanani khanante, appekacce katthani phalente, appekacce bhajanani dhovante, appekacce udakamanikam patitthapente, appekacce asanani pannapente, keniyam pana jatilam samamyeva mandalamalam patiyadentam.
mn92:7.2: “kim nu bhoto keniyassa avaho va bhavissati vivaho va bhavissati mahayanno va paccupatthito, raja va magadho seniyo bimbisaro nimantito svatanaya saddhim balakayena”ti?
mn92:8.1: “Na me, bho sela, avaho bhavissati napi vivaho bhavissati napi raja magadho seniyo bimbisaro nimantito svatanaya saddhim balakayena;
mn92:8.2: api ca kho me mahayanno paccupatthito.
mn92:8.3: Atthi, bho, samano gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito anguttarapesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim addhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi apanam anuppatto.
mn92:8.4: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn92:8.5: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
mn92:8.6: So me nimantito svatanaya bhattam saddhim bhikkhusanghena”ti.
mn92:10.3: Agatani kho panamhakam mantesu dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani, yehi samannagatassa mahapurisassa dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti ananna.
mn92:10.4: Sace agaram ajjhavasati, raja hoti cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
mn92:10.6: cakkaratanam, hatthiratanam, assaratanam, maniratanam, itthiratanam, gahapatiratanam, parinayakaratanameva sattamam.
mn92:10.7: Parosahassam kho panassa putta bhavanti sura virangarupa parasenappamaddana.
mn92:10.8: So imam pathavim sagarapariyantam adandena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhavasati.
mn92:10.9: Sace pana agarasma anagariyam pabbajati, araham hoti sammasambuddho loke vivattacchado”.
mn92:11.1: “Kaham pana, bho keniya, etarahi so bhavam gotamo viharati araham sammasambuddho”ti?
mn92:11.2: Evam vutte, keniyo jatilo dakkhinam bahum paggahetva selam brahmanam etadavoca:
mn92:12.1: Atha kho selo brahmano tihi manavakasatehi saddhim yena bhagava tenupasankami.
mn92:12.2: Atha kho selo brahmano te manavake amantesi:
mn92:12.4: durasada hi te bhagavanto sihava ekacara.
mn92:12.5: Yada caham, bho, samanena gotamena saddhim manteyyam, ma me bhonto antarantara katham opatetha.
mn92:13.1: Atha kho selo brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn92:13.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
mn92:13.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho selo brahmano bhagavato kaye dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani samannesi.
mn92:13.4: Addasa kho selo brahmano bhagavato kaye dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani, yebhuyyena thapetva dve.
mn92:13.5: Dvisu mahapurisalakkhanesu kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati—
mn92:13.8: “passati kho me ayam selo brahmano dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanani, yebhuyyena thapetva dve.
mn92:13.9: Dvisu mahapurisalakkhanesu kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati—
mn92:14.1: Atha kho bhagava tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhasi, yatha addasa selo brahmano bhagavato kosohitam vatthaguyham.
mn92:14.2: Atha kho bhagava jivham ninnametva ubhopi kannasotani anumasi patimasi; ubhopi nasikasotani anumasi patimasi; kevalampi nalatamandalam jivhaya chadesi.
mn92:15.2: “samannagato kho samano gotamo dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanehi paripunnehi, no aparipunnehi;
mn92:15.3: no ca kho nam janami buddho va no va.
mn92:15.4: Sutam kho pana metam brahmananam vuddhanam mahallakanam acariyapacariyanam bhasamananam:
mn92:15.5: ‘ye te bhavanti arahanto sammasambuddha te sake vanne bhannamane attanam patukaronti’ti.
mn92:15.6: Yannunaham samanam gotamam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
mn92:15.7: Atha kho selo brahmano bhagavantam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthavi:
mn92:24.1: Alattha kho selo brahmano sapariso bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
mn92:25.1: Atha kho keniyo jatilo tassa rattiya accayena sake assame panitam khadaniyam bhojaniyam patiyadapetva bhagavato kalam arocapesi:
mn92:25.3: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena keniyassa jatilassa assamo tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi saddhim bhikkhusanghena.
mn92:25.4: Atha kho keniyo jatilo buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi, sampavaresi.
mn92:25.5: Atha kho keniyo jatilo bhagavantam bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn92:25.6: Ekamantam nisinnam kho keniyam jatilam bhagava imahi gathahi anumodi:
mn92:26.9: Atha kho bhagava keniyam jatilam imahi gathahi anumoditva utthayasana pakkami.
mn92:27.1: Atha kho ayasma selo sapariso eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
mn92:27.2: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
mn92:27.3: Annataro kho panayasma selo sapariso arahatam ahosi.
mn92:28.1: Atha kho ayasma selo sapariso yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamsam civaram katva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
